Question:
The following reaction has an equilibrium constant of K. = 2.2 x 10^6 at 298 K. 2 COF2 (g) <=> CF4 (g) + CO2 (g) Calculate Kp for the following reaction at the same temperature. 2 CF4 (g) + 2 CO2 (g) = 4 C0F2 (g)
A) 4.5 x 10^7
B) 2.2 x x10^6
C) 4.8 x 10^(12)
D) 2.1x 10^(-13)
E) None of the choices A-D
